name: Rhythm Services Network
tag_list: wireless, mobile, solution, end-to-end, software, consulting, marketing, strategy, handsets, roadmap
overview:
Rhythm Services also offers a one-stop consultancy solution for designing and commercializing new mobile phones and solutions. They also offer strategy consulting to develop company as well as product development strategies along with comprehensive engineering services that significantly reduce development costs and shorten delivery schedules.

Rhythm Services was founded in 2008 and is managed by seasoned high-tech entrepreneurs and industry executives from world-class mobile, IP, and systems companies.

Developing an patent pending, end to end mobile solution with focus around increasing the Carrier ARPU.
